item.title: Presentation Ninja
item.description: background-image: url(https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Sharingan_triple.svg) ??? Image credit: Wikimedia Commons class: inverse, center, middle Get Started Hello World Install the xaringan package from Github: devtools::install_github("yihui/xaringan") – You are recommended to use the RStudio IDE, but you do not have to. Create a new R Markdown document from the menu File -> New File -> R Markdown -> From Template -> Ninja Presentation;1 – Click the Knit button to compile it; –
